item.description:
Event Update - Meet the CTNites.com VIP Club in the lobby at 7:30 (we will be wearing black "Official CTNites.com VIP Clubber" t-shirts and choose which movie you want to see. For any Questions or Problems, or if you can't find the Theater, call Robert at (860) 569-8094

CTNites.com MOVIE NIGHT!

WHAT: Michael Clayton * Lamb for Lions * Why did I get Married? * Gone Baby Gone
WHERE: The Parkade Cinemas and Entertainment

WHEN: Friday December 7 at 7:30 PM

The CTNites.com VIP Entertainment Club is able to get everyone the discounted ticket price of $3.75!

Join us for a great Nite at the Movies in Manchester and choose between Michael Clayton with George Clooney or Lamb For Lions with Tom Cruise, Meryl Streep and Robert Redford

Click Here for more info


After the movie, join us across the street in the Manchester Parkade at:

Time-Out Sports Bar & Grill
346 West Middle Turnpike
(Manchester Parkade)
Manchester, CT 06040
649-7400

Located directly across the parking lot from the Parkade Cinemas

All CTNites.com VIP Clubbers will receive a 10% discount on everything!

We will be handing out VIP Entertainment Club cards which will give the clubbers $3.75 admission to the Parkade Cinemas and a 10% discount at Time-Out anytime!


RSVP Now!

group.name: Connecticut Theatre Group Arts-Theater Events Group Discount

item.name: CTNites.com Movie Nite with Michael Clayton or Lambs for Lions $3.75
